events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle on 2024-04-30 during heavy traffic on the highway.
After initial review, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the reported car collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to manage the customer's auto accident claim promptly.
The customer received formal acknowledgment of their claim submission and next steps were outlined.
The agent requested vehicle photos, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with the claim investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documentation including photos of the car damage and the police accident report.
Investigation into the cause and liability of the vehicle collision began based on submitted evidence.
The investigation concluded with confirmation that the customer was not at fault in the auto accident.
A fair settlement offer covering the full cost of vehicle repairs was proposed to the customer.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the timely handling of the claim.
Final approval was granted for the settlement amount after validation of all claim details.
Payment for the approved amount was successfully issued to the customerâ€™s account.
The claim case was officially closed following issuance of payment and customer confirmation.
